public class BlockRealMatrix extends AbstractRealMatrix implements Serializable {
    public static final int BLOCK_SIZE = 52;
    private static final long serialVersionUID = 4991895511313664478L;
    private final int blockColumns;
    private final int blockRows;
    private final double[][] blocks;
    private final int columns;
    private final int rows;

    private int blockHeight(int i) {
        if (i == this.blockRows - 1) {
            return this.rows - (i * 52);
        }
        return 52;
    }

    private int blockWidth(int i) {
        if (i == this.blockColumns - 1) {
            return this.columns - (i * 52);
        }
        return 52;
    }

    public BlockRealMatrix(int i, int i2) throws NotStrictlyPositiveException {
        super(i, i2);
        this.rows = i;
        this.columns = i2;
        this.blockRows = (i + 51) / 52;
        this.blockColumns = (i2 + 51) / 52;
        this.blocks = createBlocksLayout(i, i2);
    }

    public BlockRealMatrix(double[][] dArr) throws NotStrictlyPositiveException, DimensionMismatchException {
        this(dArr.length, dArr[0].length, toBlocksLayout(dArr), false);
    }

    public BlockRealMatrix(int i, int i2, double[][] dArr, boolean z) throws NotStrictlyPositiveException, DimensionMismatchException {
        super(i, i2);
        this.rows = i;
        this.columns = i2;

            int i7 = 0;

                    throw new DimensionMismatchException(dArr[i5].length, iBlockHeight * blockWidth(i7));
                }
                if (z) {
                    this.blocks[i5] = (double[]) dArr[i5].clone();
                }
                i7++;
                i5++;
            }
        }
    }

    public static double[][] toBlocksLayout(double[][] dArr) throws DimensionMismatchException {

                throw new DimensionMismatchException(length2, length3);

    public static double[][] createBlocksLayout(int i, int i2) {

                int i9 = i8 * 52;
                dArr[i5] = new double[(FastMath.min(i9 + 52, i2) - i9) * iMin];
                i5++;

        }
        return dArr;
    }

    public BlockRealMatrix copy() {

        int i = 0;
        while (true) {
            double[][] dArr = this.blocks;
            if (i >= dArr.length) {

            }

            i++;

    public double[][] getData() {

        for (int i2 = 0; i2 < this.blockRows; i2++) {
            int i3 = i2 * 52;
            int iMin = FastMath.min(i3 + 52, this.rows);
            int i4 = 0;
            int i5 = 0;
            while (i3 < iMin) {
                double[] dArr2 = dArr[i3];
                int i6 = this.blockColumns * i2;
                int i7 = 0;

                    System.arraycopy(this.blocks[i6], i4, dArr2, i8, 52);
                    i8 += 52;
                    i7++;
                    i6++;

                System.arraycopy(this.blocks[i6], i5, dArr2, i8, i);
                i4 += 52;
                i5 += i;
                i3++;
            }
        }
        return dArr;
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double getNorm() {
        double[] dArr = new double[52];
        double dMax = 0.0d;
        for (int i = 0; i < this.blockColumns; i++) {
            int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i);
            Arrays.fill(dArr, 0, iBlockWidth, 0.0d);
            for (int i2 = 0; i2 < this.blockRows; i2++) {
                int iBlockHeight = blockHeight(i2);
                double[] dArr2 = this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i2) + i];
                for (int i3 = 0; i3 < iBlockWidth; i3++) {
                    double dAbs = 0.0d;
                    for (int i4 = 0; i4 < iBlockHeight; i4++) {
                        dAbs += FastMath.abs(dArr2[(i4 * iBlockWidth) + i3]);
                    }
                    dArr[i3] = dArr[i3] + dAbs;
                }
            }
            for (int i5 = 0; i5 < iBlockWidth; i5++) {
                dMax = FastMath.max(dMax, dArr[i5]);
            }
        }
        return dMax;
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double getFrobeniusNorm() {
        double d = 0.0d;
        int i = 0;
        while (true) {
            double[][] dArr = this.blocks;
            if (i < dArr.length) {
                for (double d2 : dArr[i]) {
                    d += d2 * d2;
                }
                i++;
            } else {
                return FastMath.sqrt(d);
            }
        }
    }

    public BlockRealMatrix getSubMatrix(int i, int i2, int i3, int i4) throws NumberIsTooSmallException, OutOfRangeException {

                    i7 = i12;

                i14 = i6 + 1;
                i12 = i7;

            i12++;
        }
        return blockRealMatrix;
    }

    private void copyBlockPart(double[] dArr, int i, int i2, int i3, int i4, int i5, double[] dArr2, int i6, int i7, int i8) {
        int i9 = i5 - i4;
        int i10 = (i2 * i) + i4;
        int i11 = (i7 * i6) + i8;
        while (i2 < i3) {
            System.arraycopy(dArr, i10, dArr2, i11, i9);
            i10 += i;
            i11 += i6;
            i2++;
        }
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public void setSubMatrix(double[][] dArr, int i, int i2) throws NumberIsTooSmallException, OutOfRangeException, NullArgumentException, NoDataException, DimensionMismatchException {
        BlockRealMatrix blockRealMatrix = this;
        double[][] dArr2 = dArr;
        int i3 = i;
        MathUtils.checkNotNull(dArr);
        int length = dArr2[0].length;
        if (length == 0) {
            throw new NoDataException(LocalizedFormats.AT_LEAST_ONE_COLUMN);
        }
        int length2 = dArr2.length + i3;
        int i4 = i2 + length;
        MatrixUtils.checkSubMatrixIndex(blockRealMatrix, i3, length2 - 1, i2, i4 - 1);
        for (double[] dArr3 : dArr2) {
            if (dArr3.length != length) {
                throw new DimensionMismatchException(length, dArr3.length);
            }
        }
        int i5 = i3 / 52;
        int i6 = (length2 + 51) / 52;
        int i7 = i2 / 52;
        int i8 = (i4 + 51) / 52;
        while (i5 < i6) {
            int iBlockHeight = blockRealMatrix.blockHeight(i5);
            int i9 = i5 * 52;
            int iMax = FastMath.max(i3, i9);
            int iMin = FastMath.min(length2, iBlockHeight + i9);
            int i10 = i7;
            while (i10 < i8) {
                int iBlockWidth = blockRealMatrix.blockWidth(i10);
                int i11 = i10 * 52;
                int iMax2 = FastMath.max(i2, i11);
                int i12 = i6;
                int iMin2 = FastMath.min(i4, i11 + iBlockWidth) - iMax2;
                int i13 = length2;
                int i14 = i7;
                double[] dArr4 = blockRealMatrix.blocks[(blockRealMatrix.blockColumns * i5) + i10];
                int i15 = iMax;
                while (i15 < iMin) {
                    System.arraycopy(dArr2[i15 - i3], iMax2 - i2, dArr4, ((i15 - i9) * iBlockWidth) + (iMax2 - i11), iMin2);
                    i15++;
                    dArr2 = dArr;
                    i3 = i;
                }
                i10++;
                blockRealMatrix = this;
                dArr2 = dArr;
                i3 = i;
                i6 = i12;
                length2 = i13;
                i7 = i14;
            }
            i5++;
            blockRealMatrix = this;
            dArr2 = dArr;
            i3 = i;
        }
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public BlockRealMatrix getRowMatrix(int i) throws OutOfRangeException {
        MatrixUtils.checkRowIndex(this, i);
        BlockRealMatrix blockRealMatrix = new BlockRealMatrix(1, this.columns);
        int i2 = i / 52;
        int i3 = i - (i2 * 52);
        double[] dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[0];
        int i4 = 0;
        int i5 = 0;
        for (int i6 = 0; i6 < this.blockColumns; i6++) {
            int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i6);
            double[] dArr2 = this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i2) + i6];
            int length = dArr.length - i4;
            if (iBlockWidth > length) {
                int i7 = i3 * iBlockWidth;
                System.arraycopy(dArr2, i7, dArr, i4, length);
                i5++;
                dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[i5];
                int i8 = iBlockWidth - length;
                System.arraycopy(dArr2, i7, dArr, 0, i8);
                i4 = i8;
            } else {
                System.arraycopy(dArr2, i3 * iBlockWidth, dArr, i4, iBlockWidth);
                i4 += iBlockWidth;
            }
        }
        return blockRealMatrix;
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public void setRowMatrix(int i, RealMatrix realMatrix) throws OutOfRangeException, MatrixDimensionMismatchException {
        try {
            setRowMatrix(i, (BlockRealMatrix) realMatrix);
        } catch (ClassCastException unused) {
            super.setRowMatrix(i, realMatrix);
        }
    }

    public void setRowMatrix(int i, BlockRealMatrix blockRealMatrix) throws OutOfRangeException, MatrixDimensionMismatchException {
        MatrixUtils.checkRowIndex(this, i);
        int columnDimension = getColumnDimension();
        if (blockRealMatrix.getRowDimension() != 1 || blockRealMatrix.getColumnDimension() != columnDimension) {
            throw new MatrixDimensionMismatchException(blockRealMatrix.getRowDimension(), blockRealMatrix.getColumnDimension(), 1, columnDimension);
        }
        int i2 = i / 52;
        int i3 = i - (i2 * 52);
        double[] dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[0];
        int i4 = 0;
        int i5 = 0;
        for (int i6 = 0; i6 < this.blockColumns; i6++) {
            int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i6);
            double[] dArr2 = this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i2) + i6];
            int length = dArr.length - i4;
            if (iBlockWidth > length) {
                int i7 = i3 * iBlockWidth;
                System.arraycopy(dArr, i4, dArr2, i7, length);
                i5++;
                dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[i5];
                int i8 = iBlockWidth - length;
                System.arraycopy(dArr, 0, dArr2, i7, i8);
                i4 = i8;
            } else {
                System.arraycopy(dArr, i4, dArr2, i3 * iBlockWidth, iBlockWidth);
                i4 += iBlockWidth;
            }
        }
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public BlockRealMatrix getColumnMatrix(int i) throws OutOfRangeException {
        MatrixUtils.checkColumnIndex(this, i);
        BlockRealMatrix blockRealMatrix = new BlockRealMatrix(this.rows, 1);
        int i2 = i / 52;
        int i3 = i - (i2 * 52);
        int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i2);
        double[] dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[0];
        int i4 = 0;
        int i5 = 0;
        for (int i6 = 0; i6 < this.blockRows; i6++) {
            int iBlockHeight = blockHeight(i6);
            double[] dArr2 = this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i6) + i2];
            int i7 = 0;
            while (i7 < iBlockHeight) {
                if (i4 >= dArr.length) {
                    i5++;
                    dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[i5];
                    i4 = 0;
                }
                dArr[i4] = dArr2[(i7 * iBlockWidth) + i3];
                i7++;
                i4++;
            }
        }
        return blockRealMatrix;
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix

    void setColumnMatrix(int i, BlockRealMatrix blockRealMatrix) throws OutOfRangeException, MatrixDimensionMismatchException {
        MatrixUtils.checkColumnIndex(this, i);
        int rowDimension = getRowDimension();
        if (blockRealMatrix.getRowDimension() != rowDimension || blockRealMatrix.getColumnDimension() != 1) {
            throw new MatrixDimensionMismatchException(blockRealMatrix.getRowDimension(), blockRealMatrix.getColumnDimension(), rowDimension, 1);
        }
        int i2 = i / 52;
        int i3 = i - (i2 * 52);
        int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i2);
        double[] dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[0];
        int i4 = 0;
        int i5 = 0;
        for (int i6 = 0; i6 < this.blockRows; i6++) {
            int iBlockHeight = blockHeight(i6);
            double[] dArr2 = this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i6) + i2];
            int i7 = 0;
            while (i7 < iBlockHeight) {
                if (i4 >= dArr.length) {
                    i5++;
                    dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[i5];
                    i4 = 0;
                }
                dArr2[(i7 * iBlockWidth) + i3] = dArr[i4];
                i7++;
                i4++;
            }
        }
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public RealVector getRowVector(int i) throws OutOfRangeException {
        MatrixUtils.checkRowIndex(this, i);
        double[] dArr = new double[this.columns];
        int i2 = i / 52;
        int i3 = i - (i2 * 52);
        int i4 = 0;
        for (int i5 = 0; i5 < this.blockColumns; i5++) {
            int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i5);
            System.arraycopy(this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i2) + i5], i3 * iBlockWidth, dArr, i4, iBlockWidth);
            i4 += iBlockWidth;
        }
        return new ArrayRealVector(dArr, false);
    }

            setRow(i, ((ArrayRealVector) realVector).getDataRef());
        } catch (ClassCastException unused) {
            super.setRowVector(i, realVector);
        }

        int i3 = i - (i2 * 52);
        int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i2);
        int i4 = 0;
        for (int i5 = 0; i5 < this.blockRows; i5++) {

            int i6 = 0;
            while (i6 < iBlockHeight) {
                dArr[i4] = dArr2[(i6 * iBlockWidth) + i3];
                i6++;
                i4++;
            }
        }
        return new ArrayRealVector(dArr, false);

    public double[] getRow(int i) throws OutOfRangeException {
        MatrixUtils.checkRowIndex(this, i);
        double[] dArr = new double[this.columns];
        int i2 = i / 52;
        int i3 = i - (i2 * 52);
        int i4 = 0;
        for (int i5 = 0; i5 < this.blockColumns; i5++) {
            int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i5);
            System.arraycopy(this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i2) + i5], i3 * iBlockWidth, dArr, i4, iBlockWidth);
            i4 += iBlockWidth;
        }
        return dArr;
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public void setRow(int i, double[] dArr) throws OutOfRangeException, MatrixDimensionMismatchException {
        MatrixUtils.checkRowIndex(this, i);
        int columnDimension = getColumnDimension();
        if (dArr.length != columnDimension) {
            throw new MatrixDimensionMismatchException(1, dArr.length, 1, columnDimension);
        }
        int i2 = i / 52;
        int i3 = i - (i2 * 52);
        int i4 = 0;
        for (int i5 = 0; i5 < this.blockColumns; i5++) {
            int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i5);
            System.arraycopy(dArr, i4, this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i2) + i5], i3 * iBlockWidth, iBlockWidth);
            i4 += iBlockWidth;
        }
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double[] getColumn(int i) throws OutOfRangeException {
        MatrixUtils.checkColumnIndex(this, i);
        double[] dArr = new double[this.rows];
        int i2 = i / 52;
        int i3 = i - (i2 * 52);
        int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i2);
        int i4 = 0;
        for (int i5 = 0; i5 < this.blockRows; i5++) {
            int iBlockHeight = blockHeight(i5);
            double[] dArr2 = this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i5) + i2];
            int i6 = 0;
            while (i6 < iBlockHeight) {
                dArr[i4] = dArr2[(i6 * iBlockWidth) + i3];
                i6++;
                i4++;
            }
        }
        return dArr;
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public void setColumn(int i, double[] dArr) throws OutOfRangeException, MatrixDimensionMismatchException {
        MatrixUtils.checkColumnIndex(this, i);
        int rowDimension = getRowDimension();
        if (dArr.length != rowDimension) {
            throw new MatrixDimensionMismatchException(dArr.length, 1, rowDimension, 1);
        }
        int i2 = i / 52;
        int i3 = i - (i2 * 52);
        int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i2);
        int i4 = 0;
        for (int i5 = 0; i5 < this.blockRows; i5++) {
            int iBlockHeight = blockHeight(i5);
            double[] dArr2 = this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i5) + i2];
            int i6 = 0;
            while (i6 < iBlockHeight) {
                dArr2[(i6 * iBlockWidth) + i3] = dArr[i4];
                i6++;
                i4++;
            }
        }
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double getEntry(int i, int i2) throws OutOfRangeException {
        MatrixUtils.checkMatrixIndex(this, i, i2);
        int i3 = i / 52;
        int i4 = i2 / 52;
        return this.blocks[(i3 * this.blockColumns) + i4][((i - (i3 * 52)) * blockWidth(i4)) + (i2 - (i4 * 52))];
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public void setEntry(int i, int i2, double d) throws OutOfRangeException {
        MatrixUtils.checkMatrixIndex(this, i, i2);
        int i3 = i / 52;
        int i4 = i2 / 52;
        this.blocks[(i3 * this.blockColumns) + i4][((i - (i3 * 52)) * blockWidth(i4)) + (i2 - (i4 * 52))] = d;
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public void addToEntry(int i, int i2, double d) throws OutOfRangeException {
        MatrixUtils.checkMatrixIndex(this, i, i2);
        int i3 = i / 52;
        int i4 = i2 / 52;
        int iBlockWidth = ((i - (i3 * 52)) * blockWidth(i4)) + (i2 - (i4 * 52));
        double[] dArr = this.blocks[(i3 * this.blockColumns) + i4];
        dArr[iBlockWidth] = dArr[iBlockWidth] + d;
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public void multiplyEntry(int i, int i2, double d) throws OutOfRangeException {
        MatrixUtils.checkMatrixIndex(this, i, i2);
        int i3 = i / 52;
        int i4 = i2 / 52;
        int iBlockWidth = ((i - (i3 * 52)) * blockWidth(i4)) + (i2 - (i4 * 52));
        double[] dArr = this.blocks[(i3 * this.blockColumns) + i4];
        dArr[iBlockWidth] = dArr[iBlockWidth] * d;
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public BlockRealMatrix transpose() {
        BlockRealMatrix blockRealMatrix = new BlockRealMatrix(getColumnDimension(), getRowDimension());
        int i = 0;
        for (int i2 = 0; i2 < this.blockColumns; i2++) {
            for (int i3 = 0; i3 < this.blockRows; i3++) {
                double[] dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[i];
                double[] dArr2 = this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i3) + i2];
                int i4 = i2 * 52;
                int iMin = FastMath.min(i4 + 52, this.columns);
                int i5 = i3 * 52;
                int iMin2 = FastMath.min(i5 + 52, this.rows);
                int i6 = 0;
                for (int i7 = i4; i7 < iMin; i7++) {
                    int i8 = iMin - i4;
                    int i9 = i7 - i4;
                    for (int i10 = i5; i10 < iMin2; i10++) {
                        dArr[i6] = dArr2[i9];
                        i6++;
                        i9 += i8;
                    }
                }
                i++;
            }
        }
        return blockRealMatrix;
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double[] operate(double[] dArr) throws DimensionMismatchException {
        if (dArr.length != this.columns) {
            throw new DimensionMismatchException(dArr.length, this.columns);
        }
        double[] dArr2 = new double[this.rows];
        for (int i = 0; i < this.blockRows; i++) {
            int i2 = i * 52;
            int iMin = FastMath.min(i2 + 52, this.rows);
            int i3 = 0;
            while (true) {
                int i4 = this.blockColumns;
                if (i3 < i4) {
                    double[] dArr3 = this.blocks[(i4 * i) + i3];
                    int i5 = i3 * 52;
                    int iMin2 = FastMath.min(i5 + 52, this.columns);
                    int i6 = 0;
                    for (int i7 = i2; i7 < iMin; i7++) {
                        double d = 0.0d;
                        int i8 = i5;
                        while (i8 < iMin2 - 3) {
                            d += (dArr3[i6] * dArr[i8]) + (dArr3[i6 + 1] * dArr[i8 + 1]) + (dArr3[i6 + 2] * dArr[i8 + 2]) + (dArr3[i6 + 3] * dArr[i8 + 3]);
                            i6 += 4;
                            i8 += 4;
                        }
                        while (i8 < iMin2) {
                            d += dArr3[i6] * dArr[i8];
                            i8++;
                            i6++;
                        }
                        dArr2[i7] = dArr2[i7] + d;
                    }
                    i3++;
                }
            }
        }
        return dArr2;
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double[] preMultiply(double[] dArr) throws DimensionMismatchException {
        int i;
        if (dArr.length != this.rows) {
            throw new DimensionMismatchException(dArr.length, this.rows);
        }
        double[] dArr2 = new double[this.columns];
        for (int i2 = 0; i2 < this.blockColumns; i2++) {
            int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i2);
            int i3 = iBlockWidth + iBlockWidth;
            int i4 = i3 + iBlockWidth;
            int i5 = i4 + iBlockWidth;
            int i6 = i2 * 52;
            int iMin = FastMath.min(i6 + 52, this.columns);
            for (int i7 = 0; i7 < this.blockRows; i7++) {
                double[] dArr3 = this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i7) + i2];
                int i8 = i7 * 52;
                int iMin2 = FastMath.min(i8 + 52, this.rows);
                int i9 = i6;
                while (i9 < iMin) {
                    int i10 = i9 - i6;
                    double d = 0.0d;
                    int i11 = i8;
                    while (true) {
                        i = i6;
                        if (i11 >= iMin2 - 3) {
                            break;
                        }
                        d += (dArr3[i10] * dArr[i11]) + (dArr3[i10 + iBlockWidth] * dArr[i11 + 1]) + (dArr3[i10 + i3] * dArr[i11 + 2]) + (dArr3[i10 + i4] * dArr[i11 + 3]);
                        i10 += i5;
                        i11 += 4;
                        i6 = i;
                    }
                    while (i11 < iMin2) {
                        d += dArr3[i10] * dArr[i11];
                        i10 += iBlockWidth;
                        i11++;
                    }
                    dArr2[i9] = dArr2[i9] + d;
                    i9++;
                    i6 = i;
                }
            }
        }
        return dArr2;
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double walkInRowOrder(RealMatrixChangingVisitor realMatrixChangingVisitor) {
        int i = this.rows;
        int i2 = this.columns;
        realMatrixChangingVisitor.start(i, i2, 0, i - 1, 0, i2 - 1);
        for (int i3 = 0; i3 < this.blockRows; i3++) {
            int i4 = i3 * 52;
            int iMin = FastMath.min(i4 + 52, this.rows);
            for (int i5 = i4; i5 < iMin; i5++) {
                for (int i6 = 0; i6 < this.blockColumns; i6++) {
                    int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i6);
                    int i7 = i6 * 52;
                    int iMin2 = FastMath.min(i7 + 52, this.columns);
                    double[] dArr = this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i3) + i6];
                    int i8 = (i5 - i4) * iBlockWidth;
                    while (i7 < iMin2) {
                        dArr[i8] = realMatrixChangingVisitor.visit(i5, i7, dArr[i8]);
                        i8++;
                        i7++;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        return realMatrixChangingVisitor.end();
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double walkInRowOrder(RealMatrixPreservingVisitor realMatrixPreservingVisitor) {
        int i = this.rows;
        int i2 = this.columns;
        realMatrixPreservingVisitor.start(i, i2, 0, i - 1, 0, i2 - 1);
        for (int i3 = 0; i3 < this.blockRows; i3++) {
            int i4 = i3 * 52;
            int iMin = FastMath.min(i4 + 52, this.rows);
            for (int i5 = i4; i5 < iMin; i5++) {
                for (int i6 = 0; i6 < this.blockColumns; i6++) {
                    int iBlockWidth = blockWidth(i6);
                    int i7 = i6 * 52;
                    int iMin2 = FastMath.min(i7 + 52, this.columns);
                    double[] dArr = this.blocks[(this.blockColumns * i3) + i6];
                    int i8 = (i5 - i4) * iBlockWidth;
                    while (i7 < iMin2) {
                        realMatrixPreservingVisitor.visit(i5, i7, dArr[i8]);
                        i8++;
                        i7++;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        return realMatrixPreservingVisitor.end();
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double walkInRowOrder(RealMatrixChangingVisitor realMatrixChangingVisitor, int i, int i2, int i3, int i4) throws NumberIsTooSmallException, OutOfRangeException {
        BlockRealMatrix blockRealMatrix = this;
        MatrixUtils.checkSubMatrixIndex(blockRealMatrix, i, i2, i3, i4);
        realMatrixChangingVisitor.start(blockRealMatrix.rows, blockRealMatrix.columns, i, i2, i3, i4);
        int i5 = i / 52;
        while (i5 < (i2 / 52) + 1) {
            int i6 = i5 * 52;
            int iMax = FastMath.max(i, i6);
            int i7 = i5 + 1;
            int iMin = FastMath.min(i7 * 52, i2 + 1);
            while (iMax < iMin) {
                int i8 = i3 / 52;
                while (i8 < (i4 / 52) + 1) {
                    int iBlockWidth = blockRealMatrix.blockWidth(i8);
                    int i9 = i8 * 52;
                    int iMax2 = FastMath.max(i3, i9);
                    int i10 = i8 + 1;
                    int i11 = i7;
                    int iMin2 = FastMath.min(i10 * 52, i4 + 1);
                    int i12 = iMin;
                    double[] dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[(blockRealMatrix.blockColumns * i5) + i8];
                    int i13 = (((iMax - i6) * iBlockWidth) + iMax2) - i9;
                    while (iMax2 < iMin2) {
                        dArr[i13] = realMatrixChangingVisitor.visit(iMax, iMax2, dArr[i13]);
                        i13++;
                        iMax2++;
                        i5 = i5;
                    }
                    blockRealMatrix = this;
                    i8 = i10;
                    i7 = i11;
                    iMin = i12;
                }
                iMax++;
                blockRealMatrix = this;
            }
            blockRealMatrix = this;
            i5 = i7;
        }
        return realMatrixChangingVisitor.end();
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double walkInRowOrder(RealMatrixPreservingVisitor realMatrixPreservingVisitor, int i, int i2, int i3, int i4) throws NumberIsTooSmallException, OutOfRangeException {
        BlockRealMatrix blockRealMatrix = this;
        MatrixUtils.checkSubMatrixIndex(blockRealMatrix, i, i2, i3, i4);
        realMatrixPreservingVisitor.start(blockRealMatrix.rows, blockRealMatrix.columns, i, i2, i3, i4);
        int i5 = i / 52;
        while (i5 < (i2 / 52) + 1) {
            int i6 = i5 * 52;
            int iMax = FastMath.max(i, i6);
            int i7 = i5 + 1;
            int iMin = FastMath.min(i7 * 52, i2 + 1);
            while (iMax < iMin) {
                int i8 = i3 / 52;
                while (i8 < (i4 / 52) + 1) {
                    int iBlockWidth = blockRealMatrix.blockWidth(i8);
                    int i9 = i8 * 52;
                    int iMax2 = FastMath.max(i3, i9);
                    int i10 = i8 + 1;
                    int i11 = i7;
                    int iMin2 = FastMath.min(i10 * 52, i4 + 1);
                    int i12 = iMin;
                    double[] dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[(blockRealMatrix.blockColumns * i5) + i8];
                    int i13 = (((iMax - i6) * iBlockWidth) + iMax2) - i9;
                    while (iMax2 < iMin2) {
                        realMatrixPreservingVisitor.visit(iMax, iMax2, dArr[i13]);
                        i13++;
                        iMax2++;
                        i5 = i5;
                    }
                    blockRealMatrix = this;
                    i8 = i10;
                    i7 = i11;
                    iMin = i12;
                }
                iMax++;
                blockRealMatrix = this;
            }
            blockRealMatrix = this;
            i5 = i7;
        }
        return realMatrixPreservingVisitor.end();
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double walkInOptimizedOrder(RealMatrixChangingVisitor realMatrixChangingVisitor) {
        int i = this.rows;
        int i2 = this.columns;
        realMatrixChangingVisitor.start(i, i2, 0, i - 1, 0, i2 - 1);
        int i3 = 0;
        for (int i4 = 0; i4 < this.blockRows; i4++) {
            int i5 = i4 * 52;
            int iMin = FastMath.min(i5 + 52, this.rows);
            for (int i6 = 0; i6 < this.blockColumns; i6++) {
                int i7 = i6 * 52;
                int iMin2 = FastMath.min(i7 + 52, this.columns);
                double[] dArr = this.blocks[i3];
                int i8 = 0;
                for (int i9 = i5; i9 < iMin; i9++) {
                    for (int i10 = i7; i10 < iMin2; i10++) {
                        dArr[i8] = realMatrixChangingVisitor.visit(i9, i10, dArr[i8]);
                        i8++;
                    }
                }
                i3++;
            }
        }
        return realMatrixChangingVisitor.end();
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double walkInOptimizedOrder(RealMatrixPreservingVisitor realMatrixPreservingVisitor) {
        int i = this.rows;
        int i2 = this.columns;
        realMatrixPreservingVisitor.start(i, i2, 0, i - 1, 0, i2 - 1);
        int i3 = 0;
        for (int i4 = 0; i4 < this.blockRows; i4++) {
            int i5 = i4 * 52;
            int iMin = FastMath.min(i5 + 52, this.rows);
            for (int i6 = 0; i6 < this.blockColumns; i6++) {
                int i7 = i6 * 52;
                int iMin2 = FastMath.min(i7 + 52, this.columns);
                double[] dArr = this.blocks[i3];
                int i8 = 0;
                for (int i9 = i5; i9 < iMin; i9++) {
                    for (int i10 = i7; i10 < iMin2; i10++) {
                        realMatrixPreservingVisitor.visit(i9, i10, dArr[i8]);
                        i8++;
                    }
                }
                i3++;
            }
        }
        return realMatrixPreservingVisitor.end();
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double walkInOptimizedOrder(RealMatrixChangingVisitor realMatrixChangingVisitor, int i, int i2, int i3, int i4) throws NumberIsTooSmallException, OutOfRangeException {
        BlockRealMatrix blockRealMatrix = this;
        MatrixUtils.checkSubMatrixIndex(blockRealMatrix, i, i2, i3, i4);
        realMatrixChangingVisitor.start(blockRealMatrix.rows, blockRealMatrix.columns, i, i2, i3, i4);
        int i5 = i / 52;
        while (i5 < (i2 / 52) + 1) {
            int i6 = i5 * 52;
            int iMax = FastMath.max(i, i6);
            int i7 = i5 + 1;
            int iMin = FastMath.min(i7 * 52, i2 + 1);
            int i8 = i3 / 52;
            while (i8 < (i4 / 52) + 1) {
                int iBlockWidth = blockRealMatrix.blockWidth(i8);
                int i9 = i8 * 52;
                int iMax2 = FastMath.max(i3, i9);
                int i10 = i8 + 1;
                int i11 = iMax;
                int iMin2 = FastMath.min(i10 * 52, i4 + 1);
                int i12 = i7;
                double[] dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[(blockRealMatrix.blockColumns * i5) + i8];
                int i13 = i11;
                while (i13 < iMin) {
                    int i14 = (((i13 - i6) * iBlockWidth) + iMax2) - i9;
                    int i15 = iMax2;
                    while (i15 < iMin2) {
                        dArr[i14] = realMatrixChangingVisitor.visit(i13, i15, dArr[i14]);
                        i14++;
                        i15++;
                        i5 = i5;
                        i6 = i6;
                        iMin2 = iMin2;
                    }
                    i13++;
                    iMin2 = iMin2;
                }
                blockRealMatrix = this;
                i8 = i10;
                iMax = i11;
                i7 = i12;
            }
            blockRealMatrix = this;
            i5 = i7;
        }
        return realMatrixChangingVisitor.end();
    }

    @Override // org.apache.commons.math3.linear.AbstractRealMatrix, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix
    public double walkInOptimizedOrder(RealMatrixPreservingVisitor realMatrixPreservingVisitor, int i, int i2, int i3, int i4) throws NumberIsTooSmallException, OutOfRangeException {
        BlockRealMatrix blockRealMatrix = this;
        MatrixUtils.checkSubMatrixIndex(blockRealMatrix, i, i2, i3, i4);
        realMatrixPreservingVisitor.start(blockRealMatrix.rows, blockRealMatrix.columns, i, i2, i3, i4);
        int i5 = i / 52;
        while (i5 < (i2 / 52) + 1) {
            int i6 = i5 * 52;
            int iMax = FastMath.max(i, i6);
            int i7 = i5 + 1;
            int iMin = FastMath.min(i7 * 52, i2 + 1);
            int i8 = i3 / 52;
            while (i8 < (i4 / 52) + 1) {
                int iBlockWidth = blockRealMatrix.blockWidth(i8);
                int i9 = i8 * 52;
                int iMax2 = FastMath.max(i3, i9);
                int i10 = i8 + 1;
                int i11 = iMax;
                int iMin2 = FastMath.min(i10 * 52, i4 + 1);
                int i12 = i7;
                double[] dArr = blockRealMatrix.blocks[(blockRealMatrix.blockColumns * i5) + i8];
                int i13 = i11;
                while (i13 < iMin) {
                    int i14 = (((i13 - i6) * iBlockWidth) + iMax2) - i9;
                    int i15 = iMax2;
                    while (i15 < iMin2) {
                        realMatrixPreservingVisitor.visit(i13, i15, dArr[i14]);
                        i14++;
                        i15++;
                        i5 = i5;
                        i6 = i6;
                        iMin2 = iMin2;
                    }
                    i13++;
                    iMin2 = iMin2;
                }
                blockRealMatrix = this;
                i8 = i10;
                iMax = i11;
                i7 = i12;
            }
            blockRealMatrix = this;
            i5 = i7;
        }
        return realMatrixPreservingVisitor.end();
    }
}
